home_subheading: Our goal is to provide a high quality workforce and services that are tailored to the client's needs. Our services are available all over Europe and Scandinavia. Sleep peacefully while we work.
home_right_talent: WE GOT RIGHT TALENT FOR THE RIGHT JOB
snow_paring: INQUIRY FOR SNOW OR CONSTRUCTION SERVICES
snow_response: We respond to inquiries within 1 working day!
snow_name_placeholder: Name of company, apartment association, private person
snow_object_placeholder: Enter the address of the object in question
snow_object_required: Object address is a mandatory field
snow_message_placeholder: Enter a description of the object. Expected amount of work, type of work. Estimated labor cost. PS! We will review your request within 1 business day and respond to you via email.
snow_message_success: The request has been successfully sent!
snow_services_subheading: As new services, we offer teams for constructions and apartment associations in Europe and Scandinavia to carry out the following works.
snow_services_1_sub: Snow and ice removal from roofs and yards. Removing icicles. Snow removal from industrial sites in Estonia, Europe and Scandinavia.
snow_services_2_sub: Demolition works of construction objects, private houses, apartment associations and industrial objects.
snow_services_3_sub: Post-construction debris cleaning of construction objects, private houses, apartment associations and industrial objects.
